thread.section_title: Le Meurice - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stunning Hotel, Spectacular Service!
thread.title_full: Stunning Hotel, Spectacular Service! - Review of Le Meurice, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lattejr
title: Stunning Hotel, Spectacular Service!
text:
This hotel is quite gorgeous and upscale AND client oriented.They are so friendly, helpful, personable and thoughtful. My daughter's stuffed animal was lost in the room or linen, and they were so helpful in trying to retrieve it. They even went the extra step and purchased and sent her one from Paris to LA after we returned home!!!
They were also so helpful when we needed to find a doctor.
Room service was delicious.
Everything was beautiful here, but the personalities of the staff at the front desk and the valets/bellman were wonderful!!!
When the people who work at a hotel are so friendly and kind and happy, it really makes a difference in the energy of the place.
We l ved it.
My kids didnt want to leave the room some times. The room service was THAT good for them.
hahahahah!
